name: 23rd Annual World Congress on Pediatrics
content: We are pleased to welcome you to participate in the "23rd Annual World Congress on Pediatrics” which is going to be held during August 11-12, 2022 as webinar. • All accepted abstracts will be published in the respective Journals. • Each abstract will receive a DOI provided by Cross Ref. • Exceptional privileges on group registrations. • Opening to organize Workshop/Symposia. • Outstanding Young Researcher Award and Best Poster Award Speaker and abstract pages created in Google on your name would get worldwide.
